response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value for you at $1,200,000. We understand its significance to you and would like to extend a special offer. We propose to sell the product to you at a price of $950,000, ensuring that both parties benefit from this transaction. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects our commitment to making this valuable asset accessible to you at a competitive rate. Please let us know if you require any further information or wish to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 950000}
